name: nmstoker.com
body:
### Welcome to my (very basic) landing page

> The worthwhile problems are the ones you can **really** solve or help solve, the ones you can **really** contribute something to.
> No problem is too small or too trivial if we can really do something about it. _-- Richard Feyman_

[My profile on Facebook](https://www.facebook.com/nmstoker)

[My profile on LinkedIn](https://uk.linkedin.com/in/nmstoker)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
